resources.string: Welcome to BetreTech:\nWe are a team of developers from computer science and software department of 2017/2018 batch. What collect us together starting from 2018 is seeking for technology, and to do what expected from us. This team have a great plan for the future, we believe that every great thing start from base. We all are from betre-science scholarship and we named our self Betre Tech. As always we need help from you, if you have any idea, please be free to contact us. We are very honorable to change your idea in to the real.

Bsc app is designed and implemented for all (>=101) 2017/2018 Ethiopian betre Science scholarship students that would gather us in one smartphon e or tablet. Bsc application is free android app with features favorite, game, message , Accessibility to facebook, accessibility to instagram add phone call. With Bsc app you can get the picture of >=101 Bsc students as well as you can visit their facebook a nd instagram accounts.\n Thank you for using Bsc app.
Rate us on the Play Store
